r.s: PHP documentation rendering package for PhD
r.d: A package for PhD to render the php.net (phpdoc) documentation
r.n: - Fixed Bug #54436 - gzip issues with -P PHP -f manpage (Moacir) - Fixed bug #53536 - Small display bug in attribute description for mysqli->insert_id. (Hannes) - Added support for local CSS files (Richard Quadling)
